I would recommend "Antz" (1998). The movie tells the story of a rather neurotic ant trying to break from his totalitarian society while trying to win the affection of the princess he loves.

The movie is visually stunning and it's also a very thought-provoking movie. It's a movie that you can watch more than once and each time you watch it, you learn something new or you think about something in a different way.

In conclusion, "Antz" (1998) is a really great movie. I would definitely recommend this movie to anyone who enjoys visually stunning movies with a lot of thought-provoking elements.
